paragraphs.body: Should we add a new rule that, if a User created about a name change blog about the Legend of Korra and we should inform them about its already been discussed. Can we somehow add that to the blog policy so, that no more users can create it?-- King Marth 64 (talk • other wikis • blogs) http://i1116.photobucket.com/albums/k576/DigiPen92/25px-Marthsprite.gif  http://i1116.photobucket.com/albums/k576/DigiPen92/Luigidance.gif 05:56, September 2, 2011 (UTC)
